Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 119th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: Westbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, and 119th due to, street blockage at 119th/Marshfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, and 119th due to, street blockage at 119th/Marshfield.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier debris on the tracks at Western(O'Hare). Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks at Western(O'Hare).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
